pullrequest.title: Jwt Decoder signature algorithm configuration is not used in combination with public-key-file
Base unit of metric values is unspecified when using the metrics endpoint
pullrequest.body: closes #13791 <!-- Thanks for contributing to Spring Boot. Please provide a brief description of your pull-request and reference any related issue numbers (prefix references with #). -->

pullrequest.title: made docs for Hibernate naming strategy a little more specific
added a code example and some explanation to ExitCodeGenerator docs.
Set resource cache period to zero when Devtools is enabled
pullrequest.body: resolve #3739 I always set spring.resources.cache-period to zero when I write code and debug the spring web application. It's very useful to set this value to zero. (or -1).
